creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: man in profile from PR with beard and moustache, smoking, wearing brown hat and coat and glasses; yellow ground; very loose pencil sketch on back--person in boat?
provenance: Nicolas Pietri, Ajaccio, France (until d. 1964). Private Collection, Belgium (until 2007; sale, Marie-Francoise Robert, Paris, November 23, 2007, no.65, for IAOOO Euro, to 'Gillis); '[Eric Gillis, Brussels, 2008, sold to Boerner]; [C. G. Boerner, New York; sold to Dayton, Mia Prints and Drawing Fair, Minneapolis, April 26-27, 2008]; Ruth and Bruce B. Dayton, Wayzata (2008, given to Mia on June 2, 2008).
title: Portrait of Maximilien Luce
